QuestData.Title: The Ebon Hunter
QuestData.Description: We're ready to set up the laser, but we're going to need more firepower to cut through this stuff.$B$BThe Ebon Hunter stalks the delta just southeast from here. It has an apparatus on its face that can fire a laser way stronger than what we have hooked up.$B$BWe need that.$B$BYou should go get it while we set up the laser.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect an Organic Laser Apparatus from the Ebon Hunter.
